channel.title: How do you make something repeat?
channel.description:
I am making a fishing skill, a [b]COMPLETELY[/b] full fishing skill (not having the things switch spots), and Im having trouble repeating the add item and taking time. I tried:
[ul][li]Made a void, tried to make the useItem at object continue it[/li] [li]Tried return, all I could use was return; and not return 5; etc...[/li] [li]Made action timers[/li][/ul]
And thats about what I did add. I am getting the items from Item2.java that I made.
Thanks for your help,
~Lin
